info.name: üè• OUTPATIENT WORKFLOW - Complete End-to-End
info.description:
Complete outpatient workflow supporting 2 real-world scenarios

**WORKFLOW 1 - With Lab/Imaging (Complex Case):**

1. Check-in ‚Üí ARRIVED
    
2. Record Vital Signs ‚Üí IN_PROGRESS
    
3. Create Clinical Note (DRAFT) - Initial assessment
    
4. Order Lab Tests (OPTIONAL)
    
5. Order Imaging (OPTIONAL)
    
6. Perform Lab Tests ‚Üí Get Results
    
7. Perform Imaging ‚Üí Get Results
    
8. Update Clinical Note with results
    
9. Sign Clinical Note ‚Üí FINISHED
    
10. Create & Sign Prescription
    
11. Payment
    
12. Discharge ‚Üí COMPLETED
    

**WORKFLOW 2 - Without Lab/Imaging (Simple Case):**

1. Check-in ‚Üí ARRIVED
    
2. Record Vital Signs ‚Üí IN_PROGRESS
    
3. Create Clinical Note (DRAFT) - Clinical examination
    
4. Sign Clinical Note ‚Üí FINISHED
    
5. Create & Sign Prescription
    
6. Payment
    
7. Discharge ‚Üí COMPLETED
    

**Workflow Steps:**  
0\. Setup - Authentication (3 requests)

1. Patient Booking (2 requests)
    
2. Receptionist Confirm Booking (5 requests)
    
3. Patient Check-in (3 requests)
    
4. Doctor - Record Vital Signs (2 requests)
    
5. Doctor - Clinical Note (4 requests) ‚≠ê MUST CREATE FIRST
    
6. Doctor - Lab Test Orders (6 requests) - OPTIONAL for Workflow 1
    
7. Doctor - Imaging Orders (6 requests) - OPTIONAL for Workflow 1
    
8. Doctor - Prescription (2 requests)
    
9. Receptionist - Payment (5 requests)
    
10. Receptionist - Discharge (2 requests)
    

**Total Requests:** 40

**Key Features:**  
‚úÖ Clinical Note created BEFORE Lab/Imaging orders (proper medical workflow)  
‚úÖ Lab and Imaging are OPTIONAL - skip for simple cases  
‚úÖ Auto-trigger: Vital Signs ‚Üí IN_PROGRESS, Clinical Note Signed ‚Üí FINISHED  
‚úÖ Search bookings by patient name/code  
‚úÖ Auto-save all IDs for workflow continuity

**Base URL:** [http://localhost:8080](http://localhost:8080)  
**Version:** 4.0  
**Date:** 2025-10-23

request.description: Login as patient to get access token
Login as receptionist to get access token
Login as doctor to get access token

response.name: 0.3 Login as Doctor

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Doctor ID and slot saved');

request.description: Get available time slots for booking
